SELECT t.textbook_name, t.textbook_round, d.*,w.username, GROUP_CONCAT( p.preset_position ORDER BY t.textbook_name ) presetPosition, if(d.org_id=0,'人民卫生出版社',o.org_name) orgNameOne FROM declaration d LEFT JOIN writer_user w ON w.id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN dec_position p ON p.declaration_id = d.id LEFT JOIN textbook t ON t.id = p.textbook_id LEFT JOIN org o ON o.id = d.org_id LEFT JOIN material m ON m.id = d.material_id WHERE d.online_progress > 0 AND d.is_deleted = 0 AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND d.material_id = #{materialId}
and t.id in
#{item}
and (d.realname like concat('%',#{realname},'%') or w.username like concat('%',#{realname},'%') )
and EXISTS (select dp.id from dec_position_published dp where dp.declaration_id = d.id and dp.textbook_id = t.id)
and not EXISTS (select dp.id from dec_position_published dp where dp.declaration_id = d.id and dp.textbook_id = t.id)
and d.position like concat('%',#{position},'%')
and d.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and d.org_name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
and d.org_id = 0
and o.org_name like concat('%',#{unitName},'%')
and p.preset_position in (4,5,6,7,12,13,14,15)
and p.preset_position in (2,3,6,7,10,11,14,15)
and p.preset_position in (1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15)
and d.online_progress = #{onlineProgress}
and d.offline_progress = #{offlineProgress}
GROUP BY t.textbook_round ,t.textbook_name, w.username ORDER BY t.textbook_name DESC

select sum(temp1.coun) from (
select count(*) as coun from ( select a.id from declaration a
LEFT JOIN dec_position c on c.declaration_id = a.id LEFT JOIN textbook d on d.id = c.textbook_id LEFT JOIN writer_user e on e.id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,org_name from org UNION SELECT 0,'人民卫生出版社' from org ) f on f.id=a.org_id where a.online_progress > 0 and a.is_deleted = 0 and c.id is not null
and a.material_id in ${parameter.materialId}
and d.id in
#{item}
and EXISTS (select dp.id from dec_position_published dp where dp.declaration_id = a.id and dp.textbook_id = d.id)
and not EXISTS (select dp.id from dec_position_published dp where dp.declaration_id = a.id and dp.textbook_id = d.id)
and (a.realname like concat('%',#{parameter.realname},'%') or e.username like concat('%',#{parameter.realname},'%') )
and a.position like concat('%',#{parameter.position},'%')
and a.commit_date >= str_to_date(#{parameter.startCommitDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND a.commit_date <= str_to_date(#{parameter.endCommitDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.title like concat('%',#{parameter.title},'%')
and a.org_name like concat('%',#{parameter.orgName},'%')
and a.org_id = #{parameter.orgId}
and f.org_name like concat('%',#{parameter.unitName},'%')
and c.preset_position in (4,5,6,7,12,13,14,15)
and c.preset_position in (2,3,6,7,10,11,14,15)
and c.preset_position in (1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15)
and a.online_progress = #{parameter.onlineProgress}
and a.offline_progress = #{parameter.offlineProgress}
GROUP BY a.id
HAVING GROUP_CONCAT(c.syllabus_id SEPARATOR "") != ""
HAVING GROUP_CONCAT(c.syllabus_id SEPARATOR "") = ""
) temp ) temp1

SELECT m.gmt_create from material m
and m.id = ${material_id}
SELECT d.gmt_create from declaration d where d.id = ${declarationId}

select a.id, a.material_id, a.realname, e.username, f.org_name unitName, a.org_name, a.org_id as orgId, a.position, a.title, a.handphone, ifNull(a.auth_date,a.commit_date) as commit_date, a.email, d.textbook_name as textbookName, c.preset_position, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(d.textbook_name,'-', case when c.preset_position =15 then '主编,副主编,编委,数字编委' when c.preset_position =14 then '主编,副主编,数字编委' when c.preset_position =13 then '主编,编委,数字编委' when c.preset_position =12 then '主编,数字编委' when c.preset_position =11 then '副主编,编委,数字编委' when c.preset_position =10 then '副主编,数字编委' when c.preset_position =9 then '编委,数字编委' when c.preset_position =8 then '数字编委' when c.preset_position =7 then '主编,副主编,编委' when c.preset_position =6 then '主编,副主编' when c.preset_position =5 then '主编,编委' when c.preset_position =4 then '主编' when c.preset_position =3 then '副主编,编委' when c.preset_position =2 then '副主编' when c.preset_position =1 then '编委' else null end ) ORDER BY d.sort Separator '</br>' )chooseBooksAndPostions,a.online_progress,a.offline_progress from declaration a
LEFT JOIN dec_position c on c.declaration_id = a.id LEFT JOIN textbook d on d.id = c.textbook_id LEFT JOIN writer_user e on e.id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,org_name from org UNION SELECT 0,'人民卫生出版社' from org ) f on f.id=a.org_id where a.online_progress > 0 and a.is_deleted = 0 and c.id is not null
and a.material_id in ${parameter.materialId}
and d.id in
#{item}
and EXISTS (select dp.id from dec_position_published dp where dp.declaration_id = a.id and dp.textbook_id = d.id)
and not EXISTS (select dp.id from dec_position_published dp where dp.declaration_id = a.id and dp.textbook_id = d.id)
and (a.realname like concat('%',#{parameter.realname},'%') or e.username like concat('%',#{parameter.realname},'%') )
and a.commit_date >= str_to_date(#{parameter.startCommitDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND a.commit_date <= str_to_date(#{parameter.endCommitDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.position like concat('%',#{parameter.position},'%')
and a.title like concat('%',#{parameter.title},'%')
and a.org_name like concat('%',#{parameter.orgName},'%')
and a.org_id = #{parameter.orgId}
and f.org_name like concat('%',#{parameter.unitName},'%')
and c.preset_position in (4,5,6,7,12,13,14,15)
and c.preset_position in (2,3,6,7,10,11,14,15)
and c.preset_position in (1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15)
and a.online_progress = #{parameter.onlineProgress}
and a.offline_progress = #{parameter.offlineProgress}
GROUP BY a.id
HAVING GROUP_CONCAT(c.syllabus_id SEPARATOR "") != ""
HAVING GROUP_CONCAT(c.syllabus_id SEPARATOR "") = ""
ORDER BY (a.online_progress=3 or a.org_id=0) desc, ifNull(a.auth_date,a.commit_date) desc, CONVERT ( f.org_name USING gbk ) ASC limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select *,o.org_name orgNameOne,m.is_multi_books,m.is_multi_position,m.is_digital_editor_optional from declaration d left join (select id,org_name from org) o on (o.id=d.org_id) left join (select id,is_multi_books,is_multi_position,is_digital_editor_optional from material) m on (m.id=d.material_id) where d.id=#{id};

select distinct d.user_id from dec_position dp left join declaration d on d.id=dp.declaration_id left join material m on m.id=d.material_id left join textbook t on t.material_id=m.id where m.is_all_textbook_published=true and m.id=#{materialId} and d.user_id not in ( select distinct d.user_id from dec_position dp left join declaration d on d.id=dp.declaration_id left join material m on m.id=d.material_id left join textbook t on t.material_id=m.id where dp.chosen_position > 0 and m.is_all_textbook_published=true and m.id=#{materialId})

SELECT concat('(',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.id separator ','),')') as mymaterials FROM material m LEFT JOIN material_contact c ON m.id = c.material_id LEFT JOIN material_project_editor p ON p.material_id = m.id LEFT JOIN textbook e ON e.material_id = m.id WHERE m.is_deleted = FALSE
AND (m.director = 4 OR p.editor_id =4 OR e.planning_editor = 4 OR m.founder_id = 4) AND m.is_all_textbook_published =0 AND m.is_force_end =0
select d.material_id from declaration d where id=#{declarationId}
